title: Fields to be locked, BRUGERE and FIRMAER
description:
**BACKGROUND**

We have two cache-fields in both BRUGERE and FIRMAER.
These two fields we need to lock, so they are not possible to edit, for anybody else than admin-users.

**SOLUTION**
We need to lock the fields for editing, on all users that are not admin.
This is to be done for both BRUGERE and FIRMAER.

The workflows updating the fields when editing a BRUGER or FIRMA should still be fully functional.

![image](/uploads/e4e627fd5d5addd4f79c133fb0c818af/image.png)

**TEST**

- Test that a user non-admin can not edit the two fields
- Test that the workflow updating the two fields, when editing a firma or bruger, iss still functional.

title: Small int(10) in header above
Making simple logging functionality for importer
description:
We would like to note down the following logging for each of the importers running in the below:

![image](/uploads/e65036cd09f517e7e37b227cd0e106c5/image.png)

In the above example we have 15 imports, such as "address". 

For each time we run an import (like "address") we would like to note the following:
1) How many lines (records) there are in each file to be imported
2) what datetime the import starts for each importer
3) What current line we are importing (this same number be updated for each line we import - OR if it will be a big problem for speed of import you can do it for every 10 line we import or every 100 line we import). Ie. this is just 1 number we're updating, not a number of lines in a logfile.
4) what datetime the import stops for each importer

This way we can know roughly how far the importer is in % (ie. 10000/25000 * 100 = 40%), and once each importer is done, we will know approx how long it took, and thereby once we've fully done an importert the first time, we will have an approx idea on how long time a full import takes.

As per our discussion, kindly note that we will need the same functionality in http://gitlab.simplyhq.com/Modules/Module-Massimporter as this is to be our future importer, and we will then cancel the current danva importer.

---

After this i suggest you add an extra colum to the left, where you write something like "Start: datetime - percentage" and if it is done the percentage will of course be 100% and you can write after the datetime how long it took.

Ie. similar to this:

![image](/uploads/cdf3c4a5f17556f84e5039177e123ed1/image.png)

title: Project, BudgetSummary, Adding "Accumulated" data. "Vis akkumuleret" button
description:
***Baseline for task***

In the view of BudgetSummary, we need to add accumulated data.
This means that we calculate Q1 + Q2 for example, when it is Q2. See examples below.

We need to be able to turn it on and off.


***Description of solution***


In this view, please add a "on/off" slider, which should be named "Vis akkumuleret".
By default it should be ON, which means that it should take all the values up to the given quarter.
Let me explain with example. 

- Q1_field : 5

- Q2_field : 5

- Q3_field : 5

- Q4_field : 5


When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned on, and choosing Q1 it should write 5.

When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned on, and choosing Q2 it should write 10  (because 5 from Q1 + 5 from Q2)

When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned on, and choosing Q3 it should write 15  (because 5 from Q1 + 5 from Q2 + 5 from Q3)

When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned on, and choosing Q4 it should write 20  (because 5 from Q1 + 5 from Q2 + 5 from Q3 + 5 from Q4)



When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned off, and choosing Q1 it should write 5.

When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned off, and choosing Q2 it should write 5  (because 5 from Q2)

When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned off, and choosing Q3 it should write 5  (because 5 from Q3)

When "Vis akkumuleret" is turned off, and choosing Q4 it should write 5  (because 5 from Q4)



![image](/uploads/8c003786faa2cbe9489628528b1cc23a/image.png)

***Tests to be made by developer, before returning it***

- Approva budget, and then reset it through using the button.

It creates the salesorder for subscription, and a salesorder for danskvand.
They get 3 danskVAND magazines.



- Stemmeberettiget Medlem
This invoices "Stemmeberettiget medlem"
It creates the salesorder for subscription, and a salesorder for danskvand.
This is the calculations of 5000+6500, bsed on the waterportions.

The number of danskvand, is based on how many of the 4 portion-type they do.
A maximum of 2 magazines can be assigned here.



- VUDP Contribution
This is not a subscription, but a voluntarily contribution based on the VUDP checkbox on the accounnt.
It creates the salesorder for subscription, and 0 / NO salesorder for danskvand.
This is the calculations of 0.011 times the amount of M3 the account has.


***Description of solution***

We need to make the following changes

**Change 1 - renaming button**
This button, should simply be renmaed to "Stemmeberettiget faktura".
The functionality should not be changed for the button. It is good as it is, and creating things as it should. 
BUT ... We need to remove the check for "VUDP" on this type of invoice also. It should simply use this, when the membership type is "Stemmeberettiget medlem".
![image](/uploads/5c35178173677c3108242e7a100ee0ce/image.png)


**Change 2 - New button added**

A new button should be added, called "VUDP Faktura"
When clicking that, the invoice created should be on the value of 

0.011 * The numbers seen here (m3)

![image](/uploads/ae0e7a3dc8a7d8c7534b6fc77bc7888e/image.png)

It should write the invoice, with 4 lines on it, just like the button from "Change 1" does, but without calculating any special price. So always 4 lines on the Salesorder, with 0.011 x the-value-from-waterportions

In order to be able to control this, we need to add a field like the following: 

![image](/uploads/19d9498608a31b886e79c2c72bcc2e92/image.png)

So the above field is not updated with year, when this button is pushed.
The new field called "VUDP Faktureret" is updated instead.

That way we can control that a "Stemmeberettiget medlem" has been invoiced for both the basic subscription, and the VUDP subscription.


Some of the DANSKVAND is related to this ticket also http://gitlab.simplyhq.com/root/danva/issues/843


***Tests to be made by developer, before returning it***

- Be able to make an invoice for the Stemmeberettiget Medlem

- Be able to make a second invoice, for the same member, but for the VUDP invoicing.

title: Invoicing a user, without them having an invoice adress or primary adress
description:
***Baseline for task***

We have several rules for the invoicing, based on the invoice-adress as you know.
It seems to lack one though, which is that when we invoice something, without a primary adress, and without an invoice adress,
then we create a new invoice adress, based on the e-mail we have on the user.

I tried doing that on this http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Contacts&view=Detail&record=7319373&mode=showDetailViewByMode&requestMode=summary&tab_label=Bruger%20Resum%C3%A9

And I get this salesorder info:
![image](/uploads/f287457f96fe467116d34f5e7459e4d1/image.png)


***Description of solution***

Whenever something is getting invoiced, and there is no valid invoice adress, then we need to do the following.

a. If there is a primary adress, then we insert that primary adress into the "Invoice adress" also.

b. If there is no invoice adress, and no primary adress, then we create a new invoice adress and insert the "e-mail" of the user, into the faktura e-mail.

c. If there is no e-mail on the user himself to copy in, then we have to error the invoicing, and return information for the client.

![image](/uploads/f287457f96fe467116d34f5e7459e4d1/image.png)





***Tests to be made by developer, before returning it***

- Check more than one place, that the functionality is working when you try to invoice.
- Check that the salesorder gets the data correctly on the salesorder.

title: Cron to close subscriptions
description:

![image](/uploads/82aa103f9345a02b8d36c5937815fb81/image.png)


***Description of solution***

Build a cron, that runs every day at 00:30 for example, and closes the membershiplines.

![image](/uploads/82aa103f9345a02b8d36c5937815fb81/image.png)

The date of today, should be in "Slut dato" AND in "Udløbsdato" AND Opsagt dato is not NULL.
If those requirements are true, then status should be set to "Ikke aktiv".

Next it should update the SalesOrders connected to the contact or Firma. If the salesorder is one of the 3 

DanskVand abonnement, Medlemskab
DanskVand abonnement, fri
DanskVand abonnement, betalt


If it finds these, then it should update the status to "Annulleret" on that specific Salesorder. No other products should have their status updated.

title: Budgetview, errors when choosing "Medtag underprojekter"
description:
***Baseline for task***

![image](/uploads/be06bb7b77ebffe8d54c341c6fa24906/image.png)



***Description of solution***

We need to work with better "What if" solutions.
For example by using an always positive choice-selection, so if a given scenario isnt 100 % confirmed, instead
of just showing "whatever", it should provide an error explaining why it didnt choose anything.

As it is currently, in general (not this specific error only), it seems we are allowing for scenarios to happen,
without having verified them positively first. Hence also the error with the adresses. We have to only allow something to work, on verified scenarios.



***Tests to be made by developer, before returning it***

- Test the button
- Think through what we can do to avoid these "accidental" scenarios, and instead lock the software more, so we are
always in charge of each scenario. 
It has to be solved programmatically so we dont continously get surprises with things not working.

- Wagegroup should be possible to change

title: employeesettings, button
description:
Please implement a button here 

![image](/uploads/e56db09b29632ba17c16cd35bfb7dce2/image.png)

The button should do the following:

First it should ask if you want to create "this year" or "next year".


Then depending on the choice, you do the following (if this year, it is 2018 for example, if next year it should copy to 2019).

For each user, check if an EmployeeSetting exists, with a "Aktiv fra" date of this year (i.e. currently 2018).
If it does not exist, then try to find one for last year (i.e. 2017) for the same user.

If that exists, you copy that record, and the fields on it, but you update the following on the new record:

Flex Dato:  01.01.2018  (if 2018 is this year)
Aktiv fra: 01.01.2018   (if 2018 is this year)

If more than 1 exists from last year, you clone the newest one, based on the latest "Aktiv fra" date.

-----

If last year doesnt exist you move one year more back, and one year more back (up to 5 years back).

-----

The Users to be created, is users who is part of the "Alle Danva medarbejdere" group.

title: DanskVand, medlem
description:
We have a calculation today, when we create a salesorder on a membershipline with »stemmeberettiget medlem«. It checks the number of waterportions a company has, and then gives them that number of DanksVAND. Specifically it uses this: 

![image](/uploads/90a5af93de62849875c8802ec03ca5f2/image.png): 


We need to change this, so instead the logic checks if there is a value in 
one of these two

title: Add contacts to users, and these users to a "project-specific user group" for projects to allow them to participate on projects
description:
We need to make some "network groups" where contacts can participate on projects. 

The easiest solution we can come up with is to allow these contacts to access the project as normal users. Please let me know if you have even simpler ideas :)

We could then add these users to the assigned-to, giving them reduced access, so they can only access the projects which they are assigned to.

At the same time the current access to the projects (ie. with current assigned-to etc) is working as it should, so we dont want to mess it up.

Therefore we suggest adding an extra "assigned-to" field with a group of the users required to access the project. **If this is a silly way of doing it, then please let me know** - we can also discuss other ways of doing it?

So to do the above, the way we see it we need to have the following functionalities in place:

* [ ] Each time we assign a contact to a project, this contact should be created as a real user in the CRM (if they do not already exist), and get email notification on this.  They should be created as a special "project user" role, so they only get access to projects, and none of the other modules.

* [ ] All contacts should automatically be added to a new user-group, perhaps named "Project-7054963" for http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Project&view=Detail&record=7054963 etc. Each time there is alterations to the contacts, ie. someone removed or added, the project's usergroup ("Project-7054963") should automatically be reflected to match this by removing or adding the user from this user-group.

* [ ] We should add an extra "assigned-to" field called something like "Participating project users" which will point to the projects user group (ie. "Project-7054963" in our example). This will work as the other assigned to, but hold the users created automatically from contacts, so that Danva can still see who is project owner (ie the current assigned-to) as a separate role.

title: Budget coloring
description:
We need to update the coloring here in the following way:

![image](/uploads/7fa7208d45812fc46680254163a4c0cc/image.png)


It needs to be dependant on the status, and on what is chosen in this dropdown:

![image](/uploads/5f63b9a4ab6dd6730c66689bd58ffe65/image.png)



- So if "Grundbudget" is chosen, it looks at the status of the Baseline.
- If "Forecast" is chosen, then it looks at the status of Forecast.
- If "Forslag" is chosen, then it only holds a gray background color. nothing else.


This red color is used when 

Grundbudget chosen + Baselinestatus=Ikke Godkendt 
or
Grundbudget chosen + Baseline Status has no status
or
Forecast chosen + Forecast Status has no status
or
Forecast chosen + Forecast Status=Ikke godkendt




The green color is used when
Grundbudget chosen + Baseline status = "Godkendt"

ForecastBudget chosen + Forecast satus = "Godkendt"



The yellow color is used when
Grundbudget chosen + Baseline status = "Request for Approval"
Forecast chosen + Forecast status = "Approval pending"

title: Salesorder created
description:
![image](/uploads/5ec7bff036330dc89dccc79acd00a381/image.png)

- **Phone number field not filled out it seems.**

Also there is no shipping informations written here.
It was chosen in the frontend that the shipping should be set to the Invoice adress.

This has to be set both on this salesorder, and on the user that created it, if there exists no shipping adress allready.

It only related an "Invoice adress", and did not relate an "Shipping adress".

Please implement the following logic:

a. If there is no primary adress on the user already, then you set the "Primary adress" field to be the same as the Invoice Adress field.

b. If there is no shipping adress on the user already, then you set the "Shipping adress" field to be the same as the Invoice Adress field, IF NO NEW SHIPPING adress was inserted in the order proces

c. If New shipping adress was also written in the order process, AND THERE IS NO SHIPPING ADRESS already on the user, then you set the Shipping adress field to the new adress from the order proces.

title: Script to check budgetposts
description:
Please build a button here, which does the following:

![image](/uploads/483e59bc32935573891d53b8b711cbb9/image.png)


FOR EACH USER.... it should check that a "Budgetpost" exists, with relation to the user, 
and with a relation to the BudgetCollection that holds the date of today, between Startdate and slutdate.

It should check the Projects:

- Ferie  
- Særlige feriedage
- Omsorgsdage

If no BudgetCollection exists with todays date between start and slut, then your script should create a new one, copying the last one there, giving it correct name.

EXAMPLE:

BudgetCollections are related to project Ferie.
We check that todays date, is between "startdato and slut-dato", so we can find what "BudgetCollection" we want to check for a budgetpost that way.

![image](/uploads/a64783f090034b12b207fb5f9c8c6a5d/image.png)

Now we take the BudgetCollection, and finds the budgetposts related. Here we need to check that a BudgetPosts exist, with the user we are checking.

![image](/uploads/7a6259d2bf1020756465fba3014d7899/image.png)

IF THERE IS NO BUDGETPOST, we need to create it for that specific user. 
The importance is that the relation between project, budgetcollection and budgetpost is kept.

title: Cancelling a subscription
description:
When pressing this button "Annuller".
It should popup and ask me several things.

![image](/uploads/477a363acfce56272d4303b121a0491b/image.png)

"
Hvilken dato ønsker du at udmelde medlemmet:   xx.yy.zzzz
Når du trykker OK, vil du udmelde medlemmet pr. den givne dato.

CANCEL   /    ACCEPT
"

The xx.yy.zzzz is the date that the subscription should be cancelled (so it is a calendar to choose).
After that, the date is inserted into a new field called "Udløbsdato" on the membershipline.

title: EAN Field
description:
The EAN field needs to only live on the "Invoice adress".

This means that these 2 fields will no longer be there.

![image](/uploads/1dd876a5f1cf4a646e145590a4c5db33/image.png)

In that relation (and overall because of the adress-changes) 
we need to change the invoice-functionality that is there today.

** What it should do is close to today.**
Whenever invoicing, we look at the Bruger or Firma, and use the adress that is in the "Invoicing adress".
This invoice adress, will be the one to use always, as we will relate the alt. debitor adress in that field.

If there is no Invoice adress, then it should create an invoice adress, based on the "Bruger" or "Firma" e-mail, and set that
e-mail to "Faktura e-mail", and the information we have on the given Bruger or Firma (fields on the account or Organization).


Once the above is done, and we have EAN and EAN XML fields on invoicing adress, we can remove it from the Company.

title: Changes to addresses layout and functionality
description:
We will show 3 address types, which are "hardcoded", ie always shown no matter if any of them are filled in or not:

1. **Primary address**
1. **Invoicing address**
1. **Shipping address**

So unlike current, where we are dynamically showing from **0** to **unlimited** addresses, we will always show 3 addresses.

Outside each address there will be a dropdown.

The dropdown for each address-type will contain all the adresses that are already related to the contact, his company or the company group. The address that is currently "active" will be pre-selected in the dropdown. It should also be possible to select "empty" in the dropdown, so no address is selected.

![image](/uploads/961bd7c2c4e5f2a2aa342bb881aee78a/image.png)

So: The addresses shown in picklist are all address related to the contact or organisation or company-group (ie. All addresses related to companies in parent, daughter or sister-companies)


Please also note that in the wireframe layout above, I've made the field labels less wide, so there is most space used on the actual content, and less on the field labels. Also, we would like the field labels to be written in strong/bold and the contents in regular.

--

Specifically for the **invoice-address**, and *only* for this address, we will also need to display 3 additional fields:

1.  **The invoice email** - already found on address-records, but should only be shown on invoices.
1.  **The EAN-number (13 digits)** - Currently found on companies.
1.  **The EAN-format (picklist of with options "XML" and "UBL")** - Currently found on companies.

These will also have special functionality regarding Alternative Debitor, as described later under special functionality.


Also, we will show (+ allow edit) of the Altenative Debtior here, if the current record is a Contact. 

If we are looking at a contact, then alternative debitor fields will also be shown under the invoicing address. This is presented like in “edit” mode, so directly changeable – and any selected Altnerative debitor is also shown there.

![image](/uploads/723e3b55e70e7ec597cc0632868ae849/image.png)


--

**SPECIAL FUNCTIONALITY**

There will also be the following specific functionalities added: 

1. **Primary address of contacts will automatically be the address taken from contacts organisation.** If you change organisation, then the primary address is also updated to reflect the new organisation, UNLESS there was manual change to this address. In that case we will keep the newly adjusted primary address. As an example if i manually change it to some other address - in this case you can perhaps just check when user changes Organisation if the current primary address is the same as previous organisation, then make it into the new organisation, and if not then keep current?

1. **If there is "alternative debitor" selected, then this address is the one shown under invoicing address.**  Ie. taking the alternative debitor's current invoicing address. If Alternative debitor is changed, then this address is also automatically changed to be the invoicing address of the new alternative debitor. 
 
1. **If a contact has no invoicing address selected, then the Contacts own email is used for "invoicing-email".** This email is physically shown under invoicing - (and then here is of course no EAN, as the contact has no EAN) - just "shown" so the users of the CRM knows that this is the email any invoices will be sent to. 

1. **If you select or add a shipping address, then THIS address will not be automatically changed.** Ie. if user selects a different shipping address - perhaps because he wants magazines sent to a vacation home or private address or other - then any following change of Organisation or Alternative Debitor will not result in any change in this address. This address is fully independant of the above addresses.



... 

So basically the 3 boxes will look like this (very scaled down - the shown fields of Primary and Shipping are similar):

[danva-wireframe-2.pdf](/uploads/6349cb9e0a9bc2d7fc04f8807e575a6c/danva-wireframe-2.pdf)

title: Small addition to budget posts
description:
Add 2 fields to budget posts, and make calculations

We will need to add 2 fields to internal budget posts (ie. they can be there "all the time", but only actually used on internal budget posts). 

With internal budget posts, i mean budget-posts related to internal projects, such as:

1. "Vacation" ("ferie" - http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Project&view=Detail&record=6443044)
1. "Special vacation hours" ("særlige feriedage" - http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Project&view=Detail&record=6443045) 
1. "care days" ("omsorgsdage" - http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Project&view=Detail&record=6443046).

These fields will be called:

1. Baseline - here we will store the original baseline value
1. Transferred - here we will store the remaining value from previous period (previous year)

We only need to use them in Q1, so you can just add them to the Q1 block - but perhaps its easier for us to remember why/how we're using them if you make a new block called "Calculations for internal projects" and add them there, ie like:

![image](/uploads/6bb4eab0f09827257d653cfcc66b4f35/image.png)

In the case of vacations, each user has a vacation amount that is the sum of his allocated vacation hours for current year (the "baseline" - ie. typically 185 hours for 5 weeks of yearly vacation if employees weekly work-hours are standard 37) and any unused from last year (the "transferred" hours not used last period).

Example: If user "Lars Fischer" had 185 hours in last period, but only usd 178, he would this new period have 7 hours in transferred, but again 185 in baseline.

Here is his real hours taken from "ferie" project "2016/2017" budgetcollection:

![image](/uploads/392dc66928a1cea5f7c9efcc5c506781/image.png)

So if we look at his actual budget post (http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Budget&view=Detail&record=6943577&mode=showDetailViewByMode&requestMode=full) then we need to add the 2 fields "baseline" and "transferred":


Once those 2 fields are created, the above concept means that we have to make a calculations:

Each time these fields are edited (and there is a value in "baseline", otherwise it will mess up all external project budget posts also), we need to add the 2 new "baseline" and "transferred" field values together and add to the existing "Q1 timer" field.

Whenever a budget post is updated, AND there is some value in Baseline field, then the Q1 hours (“Q1 timer”) is updated as the sum of Baseline- + Transferred. Ie in our example 185 + 7 and therefore “Q1 timer” is set to 192

![image](/uploads/d88dfbc9669885ab0d8fbc30732efd47/image.png)












**Just so you understand the full idea,** this means that there are 2 scenarios where we will actually use this update-calculation. So if it is better to only make the updates on these specific cases in stead of as a general "record modified workflow" we can also do it like that.


There are 2 scenarios when this calculation function will be called:

1) When administrative personnel clicks the "Create vacation year"-button. 

This button should be created, and will in practice copy the existing Vacation-project's budget-posts from latest budgetCollection to a new BudgetCollection. Here it will take all "baseline"-fields unchanged, BUT the "transferred" will be any hours remaining from last period. Ie. if there was 7 hours left last year, the "transferred"-field will now say 7.


2) When we update the contents of these 2 fields via a new view we will have to build under EmployeeSettings. This i have a mock-up screenshot of here: 

![image](/uploads/6848c626598b7483a6ce708a0aa498ad/image.png)

And that task is added as new issue here, but is relying on this issue to be done first.

title: Budget, approval flows
description:
The functionality on this button should be changed a bit.
http://prntscr.com/iaaniq

1. The buttons should only be available for the "ProjectManager".

2. When it is the baseline we approve (very first time), then it should say 
"Send Baseline til godkendelse", and do the flow that it does currently.

3. When a baseline was approved, we can only approve proposals. So here it should be called
"Send forslag til godkendelse"
And it should follow the same flow, but using the dropdowns of the Forecast LBL_FORECAST_STATUS	and forecast dato.

When approved, it should copy the values from Proposal fields, onto the Forecast fields.

4. When awaiting approval, It should write "Afventer godkendelse" where the button is.
Once it is approved or rejected, it can again show the button for "Send forslag til godkendelse".

title: Remove extra gray box when partially reloading partial page on a record-dashboard like Contact or Organisation
description:
When you are on a dashboard of a user, organisation, etc - like here: http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Contacts&view=Detail&record=6969755 - you can see some small gray boxes outside each related module name, ie these:

![image](/uploads/a77c7452b4263e0ebe6f032bf961858f/image.png) 

When you then add a new record, sometimes the page will reload partially. Ie. click "Tilføj medlemsskab" in top of the record:

![image](/uploads/55a8b1dcf02374f55c039e7c838ee39a/image.png)

and just select "Personligt medlemsskab" in the box called "Medlemsskabstype" and click save:

![image](/uploads/e533cb6682e8d44399d7d299d7de2638/image.png)

Then you can see its reloading the page partially and there will suddenly be 2 grey boxes outside teach related module name, which is super annoying ;) - ie this:

![image](/uploads/e676364c85d6bc771cec11541064248a/image.png)

The same problem is also for other more native VT buttons, so the above is just an example.

We have a small JS that will display a count of each related module records. This should UPDATE the current grey box instead of adding a new grey box so there are not two next to each other :)

![image](/uploads/de7d17846240713e103351986c9b4897/image.png)

Does it make sense?

title: Make function to export current budget to Excel-file
description:
We have a budget module, where we can show some budgets for different projects.

You can access it here: http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=BudgetCollection&view=TimeLine (use login/pass: Admin2 / admin1234)  and select a project (example from below screenshot: "Vandhuset incl. kantine") and a period (example from below screenshot: "2017").

Here we need to also be able to export the same budget as an XLSX file. Ie. add a button to the right of the blue button in top left side of screen with the label "Indsend til godkendelse" and call it "Export to Excel".

![image](/uploads/77ad11a30a190178f4bb7136a76e7711/image.png)

This button should basically export same information as you see in the actual budget

I have attached an example of how the export should look. Ie. one Tab (worksheet) for a budget, and the layout should be like the XLSX file i've attached here. The resulting XLSX file will be in danish (see tab called "00001") but I've also created a tab called "0001_translated" where i've translated the labels to english, so you have a better chance of understanding what is going on ;-)

[Project-budget-export-example.xlsx](/uploads/3e60bada54ee3b5c19dd7c2fb030a92f/Project-budget-export-example.xlsx)

Ie. the result will be something similar to (please note this is a different budget, so the numbers etc. are not identical to the above screenshot example): 

![image](/uploads/54867d5ebcc0e993c4935009ddea2dfb/image.png)

You can perhaps use https://github.com/mk-j/PHP_XLSXWriter - or if you know another PHP XLSX creator you prefer, you can also use that.

Does it make sense? Please ask any questions here + also please add your estimate to the task, so we can align expectations with the client (who is really eager to get it ASAP! ;-))

ONCE this is done, we also need a button called "Export all budgets" that will export all project budgets that are current - ie. today must be after the budgets start-date AND today must be before the budgets end-date :-)

title: Product, add-ons for events
description:
We need to support the possibility of buying Add-ons on the webshop, on the events.
This means that we need to add a "Parent product" (without using the build in Bundle-functionality, as that will force all products in the bundle).

So we add a field of "Parent product" onto all products.
Example then is:


http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Products&view=Detail&record=6969310

Then we have this product http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Products&view=Detail&record=6969312
Which people can choose to buy extra. Overnatning means if they want to "sleep at the premises" also.
So on the "Overnatning product" (all products) we add a "Parent product" and then we releate this product onto the actual event.


Now when the webshop (the following is a different ticket ... will be described) connects and sees the parent product (6969310), it checks if there is 
any child-products also, and presents the user for the possibility of buying extra products.
It then adds those products onto the SalesOrder when creating it.

In the "Participants module" (another ticket, just describing), it will then also relate each participant to the given product. It may be better to "stamp it" into the participants, but then we will have
to limit the number of add-ons I believe (?)



This ticket is to describe, and to create the field on products if you agree on the overall thought.

title: Recognize if a member has been invoiced this year
description:
Hi Syam,

In Contacts and Firmaer, I believe we lack a field.
We need to be able to tell if a subscription has been run or not, in a given year.

This is needed to make a list of the contacts or accounts, that still has not been invoiced for 
their membership.

I suggest we make it fairly simple (as we need to change this every year).

So we create a dropdown called "Invoiced" which can hold 2016, 2017, 2018 and so on.
If the dropdown holds the year we are in (currently 2018), then it should ask the client
if they are really sure that htey want to create the salesorder.

When running multiple salesorders, it should break everything, and ask the client to run the one
with the problem alone.

Specifically it is the buttons that follows that should update the dropdowns (if you agree this is the way to do it)

title: Magazines
description:
This is related to #408

We need the following 3 fields to be fully functional, and called as below.
The same system is to be used in Kontakt, as well as in Firma.
Salesorder has to honor the "Alternativ debitor" if this is ticked on, and set delivery adress to the contact (or company if it 
is on the company).

DanskVand Abonnement, medlemsskab
-- This is the magazines you get through your membership
-- This will include the magazines they get from waterportions + the number they get through their membership
-- This is a price of 0

DanskVand Abonnement, betalt
-- This is magazines that you have to pay extra for
-- This is a price of 755 DKK

DanskVand Abonnement, FRI
-- This is free magazines, given to the company
-- This is a price of 0

We need to create different type of salesorders, with different prices.

We need to be able to create a new salesorder, when the numbers are changed. for example from
5 to 8, it should create 3 new. How do you prefer this is handled ?

We need to be able to move the number down, but here we will let the client delete the salesorders herself if this is needed.

We need to use the correct products. http://prntscr.com/hzji89
Please use a product for each of them, and create them for 2018 (as you see them for 2017 here)
Varenummer should be 730 I believe, so it ends in the same account number on C5 when exporting.


-----

Currently I believe we create a salesorder, when we create the "membership".
This is okay, but it has to update the field so it holds the correct number. This number is based on the membership, so it
should not be a problem.

-----

title: Projektowner and projektmanager
description:
We need to also locate the "Projektleder" which is from Custom_fields CSV.

ProjectManager is the custom_field_id = "12" and type = project

Projectejer / projectowner is found by taking the custom_field 21.
Then you have the "value" field which is the user itself. 

So 

- customized_id is the project,
- custom_field_id is the role (12=projektleder and 21=projektejer) 
- value is the userid of the user 

This goes into the following: http://prntscr.com/hxkdvp

title: "Bemanding" / projektmedarbejdere
description:
From members.csv, we need to setup the field of "Projektmedarbejdere" on a given project.
So we need to do the following in the import.

After creating the project, we need to connect the users and contacts to the given project.
To do this we use "members.csv".

members.csv holds the following:  http://prntscr.com/hxk5bt
user_id, project_id.

If it is a user, it is to be inserted here:  http://prntscr.com/hxk69j

If it is a contact, it should be related here: http://prntscr.com/hxk6ew


Ie. as an example there is project id 330 ("Vandhuset incl. kantine" - https://screencast.com/t/c7YMRxPlwxTB), which have user ID 66 (Irena Bille) as Project Manager and user ID 69 as project Owner.
There are a total of 10 members of this project if you look in members.csv, and it is user id 66, 34, 32, etc. as members - which matches the above screenshot completely.

title: Add notification workflows
description:
We need to add some notification workflows:

1. Project-module: When a contact OR user is related to a project, they need to get email notification about this. If you add the workflow and just a place-holder email, then let us know where this email is as a note in this issue, and we will edit it.
1. Task-module: When a task is added to a user, we need a notification about this task.
1. Project-module: When a project is rejected (or has any other status change) it should send information to project-manager and project-owner.

title: Completed projects should not be listed under timereg

title: MembershipRecords - cloning
description:
We need a script that takes all "MembershipRecords" and reclones them.

What this means is :

- Take all the "MembershipRecords" which has a "startdato" in the year before, AND (either has a "null" slutdato, or a slutdato in the year before) AND 
has a null/empty "Opsagt dato" AND status = "betalt" or Status="afventer"
Taken from here : http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=MembershipRecords&view=List

For each record, create a "Clone" of that given record, but change "Startdato" to 01-01-xxxx and End-dato to "31-12-xxxx" (where xxxx is the year we are in, for example
currently 2018).
Status should be "Afventer"
Kommentar should be "AutoCreated xxxx" (where xxxx is the year).

We need this in a function here. http://prntscr.com/hwe7jq

First, please build it to only recreate the first 2 it finds, but later on we need to build it to clone all of them.
Please add in a warning popup, where the client has to push the "Godkend" button in order to move on with the cloning.
It should write how many memberships it found in the poupup window, so the client can see what they are approving.

If the adress is owned by the company or contact showing, then the delete button is visible.
If the adress is not owned, but still related to, the company or contact showing, then the Unlink button is visible, and they will no longer hold that specific adress, but it will not be deleted.

title: Timereg: Make updates to approval requests etc., visible by changing flow + adding button to record-details

So we need to allow users to see the updates of their timereg approvals. To do this i suggest 2 things: 1. **We need to change the approval flow** so that you actually register the approval status on the applying users active employee-record. title: "Afslutning" Picklist, Project
description:
We need a picklist on a project, called "Afslutningsstatus"
It should consist of the following:

- Afslutning undervejs
- Afslutning initieret
- Afslutning godkendt
- Afslutning initieret (Direktion)
- Afslutning godkendt (Direktion)
- Afslutning afvist (Direktion)

It should send the following e-mails 

a. It should send an e-mail to approve or reject, "ProjectOwner" when dropdown is "Afslutning initieret"

b. It should send an e-mail to approve or reject, to a group called "Direktion", when dropdown is "Afslutning initieret (Direktion)

c. It should send an e-mail to the ProjectManager, that the project has been send on to "Direktion" when dropdown changes to "Afslutning initieret (Direktion")

d. It should send an e-mail to the ProjectManager+ProjectOwner, that a project has been approved, when dropdown changes to "Afslutning godkendt"

e. It should send an e-mail to the ProjectManager+Projectowner+Direktion, that a project has been approved, when dropdown changes to "Afslutning godkendt (Direktion)

g. It should send an e-mail to the ProjectManager+Projectowner+Direktion, that a project has been rejected, when dropdown changes to "Afslutning afvist (Direktion)

title: Budget, extra approval-flow
description:
On the inddividual budget we need an additional flow and dropdown information.

It is to be shown on this view (the buttons of the flow) 
http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=BudgetCollection&view=TimeLine


We need a picklist, which should include the following:

Afvigelser undervejs

Afvigelser initieret

Afvigelser godkendt

Afvigelser afvist


---

Second we need a "date-field" which is "AfvigelserDato"
This is the date on which the Afvigelser was approved.

---

Third we need a flow to control this. It is exactly the same as the 3 flows we have on project, meaning ...

Projectmanager can initiate a "Anmod om godkendelse af afvigelser", which changes the above dropdown to "Afvigelser initieret"

Now the ProjectOwner gets an e-mail, and he can approve or reject through the interface.
When approving it updates the dropdown to "Afvigelser godkendt", and when rejecting it goes into "Afvigelser afvist", and e-mail is also send here.

---

title: Budet: Add timeline-functionality with back/forth buttons between changes.
description:
Budet: Add timeline-functionality with back/forth buttons between changes.

Following issue http://gitlab.simplyhq.com/root/danva/issues/386 we should also "re-introduce" the back/forth button in our budgetview timeline - http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=BudgetCollection&view=TimeLine

Lets say i added 1 budgetpost Friday, 2 posts yesterday monday and 4 posts today:
* Today it would then show all 7 posts.
* If i step one time, it would only show 3 post (1 Friday + 2 monday)
* and if i step back one more time it would only 1 post (Friday).

Ie. it will be jumping between changes. 

The changes are defined by the modified date for each budget-item

title: Project, new field
description:
Hi Syam

We need to implement a new field on all the projects. It is based on some of the existing legacy fields.
Here is how it should work:

a. We created a new dropdown called "Afd."

b. Now in the import we need to map it in the following way:

The field "Legacy_afd" consists of some values in the form  "1 - xxxx" "2 - xxxx" for example.
Here we need to take the number, and choose the value in the new dropdown that holds the same number.
The text after is irrelevant.

Ie. this is the actual mapping:

(old legacy field ==> new picklist value)

* 1 - Rekruttering & kompetenceudvikling  ==>  1 - Teknologier

* 2 - Rammebetingelser  ==>  2 - Ydelser

* 3 - Forretningsanalyse & udvikling  ==>  3 - Selskaber

* 4 - Internationalisering  ==>  4 - Markeder

* 5 - Public affairs &  formidling  ==>  5 - Administration

* 6 - Konsulenttjenesten  ==>  6 - Konsulenttjenesten

* 7 - Foreningen  ==>  7 - Foreningen

description:

Inkluderer et spørgeskema vi skal have sammensat. Her talte vi om at det skal være "generic" så de reelt ikke får lov til at ændre på spørgsmålene, og det er samme spørgsmål på alle projekterne.

title: Usecase 2-6: Proces for afvigelser
description:
Usecase 2-6

"Ved afvigelser fra tidsplan eller budget igangsætter projektleder en godkendelsesproces hvor projektejeren skal godkende afvigelser fra projektplanen. Afvigelser forklares, dokumenteres og rapporteres til administrationschef".

Vores godkendelsesproces p.t. er en lille smule anderledes end ovenstående som jeg ser det.

a. det ser ikke på tidsplanen (men ser på budget samt forbrugt tid).
b. man godkender et budget, men man godkender ikke afvigelsen som der lægges op til her.

Jeg er usikker på om Budget-godkendelsen som det er nu, er ment sådan at det skal løse ovenstående.


Uanset... tænker jeg at det rigtige er at implementere et godkendelsesflow på selve projektet ?
Det skal så indeholde en beskrivelse (dokumenteringen de taler om), samt et flow for at få det godkendt.

Det interessante her er desuden at det er "ADministrationschef" der skal godkende, ikke projektejer. Det er altså et andet flow end vi har haft indtil nu.

Comments please ? :)

title: Changes to webshop (portal) flow
description:
We want a few changes to the current webshop flow: 

* buttons 
* progress-indicator
* header


**Buttons**

The current back/ok buttons in product.php looks like this:

![image](/uploads/ae394aac730b402fed129301399bfc1b/image.png)

We want the following general changes to next/prev buttons:

1. Change place, so "next/ok" button is **always** in right side throughout the flow, and back-button is **always in left-side of flow.
1. Make buttons 50% larger + add fontawesome "fa-arrow-right" and "fa-arrow-left"
1. Make sure the backbutton works in all the flow, ie. so i can always go back to previous page, **without loosing the data in current fields**
1. Change the green "next/ok" button colour to #4cae4c

Ie. it should end like this:

![image](/uploads/5e2bbc52f6604568b5a57bf2f76cfa75/image.png)


**Progress indicator**

Here we want to show a progress indicator for each of the 3 main steps in the order flow: 

1.  Add particpants + address
1.  Confirm terms
1.  Summarize & confirm

ie as a very rough & ugly mockup:

![image](/uploads/2b293d1b1ffb8995e62741de4fd8b51a/image.png)

The design we want for the progress-indicator is like this. Please note that we've removed the headline of the page as its written in the progress indicator. Also note that we're using next/prev buttons on all pages as described earlier + they need to be able to step back/forth without loosing their current selections.

![image](/uploads/80965001081075ae182ea1ea5aa79a7a/image.png)

I've attached the 4 PNG's needed for the flow (perhaps you only need the 3 first)

![order-flow4](/uploads/e83c06359564cf15679111dd2b7f81b0/order-flow4.png)

![order-flow3](/uploads/f489043ae95dfc1b24e7c5f1990400bc/order-flow3.png)

![order-flow2](/uploads/0238c01943b260650fd8913784ee681d/order-flow2.png)

![order-flow1](/uploads/857fc72eefb08bca748f6bfeabf80119/order-flow1.png)


**Header**

For the header, we would ideally likE same as in product.php, ie

![image](/uploads/e4b3a494201a1e52f036e2cb0511eee5/image.png)

this is last priorty compared to the above tasks.




Does this make sense? :)

title: Layout change of address widget in Contacts + Organisations
description:
We have 4 minor layout changes of address widget in Contacts + Organisations:

* The 3 buttons in top should be moved a little down so they have their own row and are not interferring with the widget headline.
* The clone-address-button has something wrong with the icon there - seems like there is also a filter-icon perhaps?: 

![image](/uploads/457d1dbfd3f21a1fb389f306b112390a/image.png)

* The first row of each address saying if its a company-address or invoicing, etc. should be white text on dark grey background, to make it easier for the users to see what kind of address they are looking at. Also the actual address type (ie. "Company address") should be written in **bold**.
* All following lines should be zebra-stribed, again to enhance how easy they are to see

Ie. the resulting widget should look like this:


![image](/uploads/7e627b4896e794ec85509a962b05ecb0/image.png)

Thats it :)

title: Roles and Profiles
description:
@kim and @syam 

I believ we can solve what we need with buttons and roles by having 2 "universes".

1. Project organisation
2. Real organisation.

The Real organisation we solve through the use of "references to" in the user - we already did that earlier today.

The project organisation we solve through the use of Profiles.

So we ssetup the following Roles.

--> Direktion     (Management)

---> Projektejer    (ProjectOwner)

----> Projektleder     (ProjectManager)

------> Projektmedlem     (ProjectMember)

Please let me know if this makes sense and matches your ideas?


![image](/uploads/c7b0df1b8f3fd1ad5847692a2565ac6e/image.png)

![image](/uploads/7fcc2e825ba1466a53e5b96e6821955d/image.png)



**New layout**

Here we have just moved existing parts of the page around to new locations. 

As the user in the current photo does not have managerial rights over other users, only his name is displayed, not user-dropdown. 

Note that there is no listview-button as he is not manager.

![image](/uploads/c0aa6fc41691016b3b0e021383aabdf9/image.png)



**New layout - but logged in as manager**

In this example, the user in the current photo is a manager, and thereby have managerial rights over other users, why his name (because he is currently viewing his own timesheet) is showed in in user-dropdown. Because the currently selected user in the dropdown is himself, he can also send the current timesheet to approval for *his* manager. 

As this is a manager, also the "listview" button is made available to him, to allow him to go to listview.

![image](/uploads/d44b63aecb345cdc169fe8d4c9ab8042/image.png)

**New layout - logged in as manager, approving his subordinate**

When logged in as a manager who should approve another user (ie. user has selected someone who is not himself), the manager can see a Approve / reject button with thumbs up / down), to approve the timesheet or send it back. 

Also as this is not his timesheet, he cannot add new time-registrations for projects, so the green add button is not shown, and the buttons there are moved all the way to the right.

![image](/uploads/4d8ec1d4a0194f81e07a99045938cfd0/image.png)

-

![image](/uploads/fee8c66ccab416b3b6d0d38b4e204c4a/image.png)


* Also note the different colour in headers
* Also note the darker background in the 3 boxes with summary of Vacation-hours used/remaining/etc + a small distance between each box
* ALSO - when approving another users timesheet (ie. not editing the hours, but approving/rejecting it) it would be nice to be obvious about this being "not-my-own-timesheet". So if it is not too difficult, please add a few pixel border in yellow around the page like this:

![image](/uploads/a97cfb18f2e04269f93125c50b05bda7/image.png)

title: Danva - Salesorders - Adresser
description:
Hi @kim

I am not sure I understand how the existing adress system functions.
From what I understand we should do the following when we generate salesorder. No matter
if it is an invoice-generated from contact / companies, or it is an order from the webshop.:

INVOICE ADRESS
We start by looking for "Alternate Debitor" field I believe, and then we use the same 
logic on that alternate debitor if there is one.
If no alternate debitor we start the following logic.

- Look for an Invoice adress, and apply it to the SalesOrder

This is found by searching for "Company adress" in the Adress-module. 
If there is several, just take the first one you find.

When we get the order through the webshop this is given in the order flow).
When we generate the invoice, we need to take it from the existing databases, and
choose the first invoice adress we find.

--> Let's pretend there is no invoice adress.. then it should instead look for Company adress 
that is related.

----> Let's pretend none is found, then it should instead look for the data on the Company itself, 
or on the Contact itself.


LEVERANCE / SHIPPING
Following the same logic as above, by looking for a "shipping adress".

--> look for shipping
----> if no shipping look for invoice
------> if no invoice look for Company




The adresses found should be written directly into the salesorder ?

From here it continues on to the CSV (just to be sure that hte CSV doesn't have it's own logic-flow also regarding adresses)
?

title: Netværksgrupper: UC-2-8 og UC-2-9
description:
UC-2-8:

Er generelt set løst hvis UC-2-1 (Projektinitiering) er løst med diverse notificeringer og projektsite, mv.

* En aktør (Interessenter, Direktionen - dvs. samme som almindelige projekter) angiver at et PI ønskes igangsat som projekt. **Det er allerede løst i UC-2-1.**
* Løsningen notificerer Ledelse om, at der er et PI til godkendelse. **Det er allerede løst i UC-2-1.**
* Løsningen opretter en bruttoliste over indkomne PI. **Det er allerede løst i UC-2-1.**
* Afvises projektet, så informeres interessent. **Det er allerede løst i UC-2-1.**
* Godkendes projektet, så tilknyttes DANVA medarbejder (fx. projektejer), interessent informeres og projektsite oprettes til netværksgruppen (vores portal). **Det er allerede løst i UC-2-1.**
* Osv. 

UC-2-9:

* Interessent kan tildele opgaver til projektdeltagere samt tidsfrist for enkelte opgaver. 2. Løsningen meddeler projektdeltagere om tildelte opgaver. **Er tasks.**
* Projektdeltager logger sig på Løsningen. **Kan være login i portal ELLER direkte i hovedinterface?**
* Løsningen giver adgang til de områder og den funktionalitet i Løsningen, som Projektdeltager er autoriseret til. **Enten løst via portal, ellers skal vi lave rolle til projektdeltagere til alm. login i hovedinterface?**
* Projektdeltager får af Løsningen adgang til de projekter, som vedkommende er deltager i, eller har deltaget i. **Enten løst via portal, ellers skal vi lave rolle til projektdeltagere til alm. login i hovedinterface?**
* Projektdeltager gennemfører tildelt opgave og registrerer dette i Løsningen samt de udarbejdede artefakter. **Løst via portal eller hovedinterface**
Projektdeltager kan søge, læse, oprette, rette og slette artefakter i Løsningen. **Løst via portal eller hovedinterface**
* Løsningen sikrer, at ændringer foretaget af en Projektdeltager, ikke overskrives af en anden Projektdeltager, men giver andre Projektdeltager mulighed for at rette.  **Er ikke helt klar på hvordan den er løst?**
* Projektdeltager har i Løsningen adgang til fora hvorfra aktøren:
* * Kan skrive indlæg, der kan ses af andre medlemmer af projektet. **Kunne være løst med kommentarer på et projekt, hvor de indlæg så fx. via workflow sendes ud til bemandede deltagere på projektet?**
* * Kan sende relevante mails til andre medlemmer af projektet.
* * Kan deltage i chat-møder med andre projektdeltagere. **DENNE mener vi er irrelevant, og mener at have fået af vide af både Lars og Jes at det ikke gør noget**
* * Har adgang til at deltage i videomøder, hvor deltagere kan lave præsentationer der er synlige for andre videomøde deltagere. **Her bruges anden løsning, fx. anymeeting.com der er gratis for alle deltagere, eller anden efter Danvas ønske**

title: Bemandings flow for projects
description:
We need to replicate the proces (again) we build for the "Status" process, but
for a different thing.

It is : https://www.screencast.com/t/DwrEGm2T

"Bemandingsstatus" picklist.

It is necessary that the ordinary "Status" picklist, has the status of
"Project Godkendt" for these things to be shown. Otherwise it shouldn't show them.

When "Bemanding undervejs", it should show a button called "Initier Bemanding"
When "Bemanding initieret", it should show two buttons. 
One called "Bemanding Tidsplan", other called "Afvis Bemanding".
When "Bemanding Godkendt", it should show the text of "Bemanding godkendt"
When "Bemanding Afvist", it should show a button called "Initier bemanding"


The purpose of the above, is to have a flow where a leader can approve
the people working on the project.

When "Tidsplan undervejs", it should show a button called "Initier Tidsplan"
When "Tidsplan initieret", it should show two buttons. 
One called "Godkend Tidsplan", other called "Afvis Tidsplan".
When "Tidsplan Godkendt", it should show the text of "Tidsplan godkendt"
When "Tidsplan Afvist", it should show a button called "Initier tidsplan"



The purpose of the above, is to have a flow where a leader can approve
the timeplan that the employee build.

It should send the same mails for Initiating, as the other flow you build. Please do not mix up this with the other flow,
it is two different flows :)

title: KontingentInvoice
description:
When running a “Kontingentinvoice” (which is done from ehre, and only from here https://www.screencast.com/t/85b5D5pXQtK) for a company, currently it calculates all together, and sends one big sum to the CSV files.

Instead it should take the data from here: 
https://www.screencast.com/t/SjzXm2Q5w7

And send 4 individual files, with 1 line in each (one for each). See attached 2 documents as examples.
[00013450-2Salgsordre2017-01-09.csv](/uploads/7a49bcf823896b9ff1b8e789ec9fece0/00013450-2Salgsordre2017-01-09.csv)

[00013450-1Salgsordre2017-01-09.csv](/uploads/46a81ca35d6a4ac31845694346983d23/00013450-1Salgsordre2017-01-09.csv)
Notice the name of the file is number-1SalgsordreDATE  number-2SalgsordreDATE

It should send the portions in the CSV file "Lev_antal", and of course keep all same format as now:

Drikkevand indvinding		24
Drikkevand distribution		24	
Spildevand transport		25	
Spildevand behandling 		25

The "Varenummer" for Drikkevand indvinding and Drikkevand distribution is 131. 

The CSV currently seems to be missing the following data:

Medlemsnummer / stamkort <--- Field 4 in the "Salgsordre" 
Varenummer is not setup <--- Field 9 in the "Salgsordre"
Lev_antal is not setup <--- Field 10


@kim @syam

så bliver det sat til Status "ProjektInitiering"

- Godkendt projekt
- Afvist projekt
- Afsluttet

Derefter sendes en mail til ProjektEjer, der 
så kan gå ind og ændre status til "Køreklar". 


Første gang only, når projektet sættes til "Projekt godkendt" sendes
mail rundt til ProjektDeltagerne om at der er go.
Projektlederen kan foretage tilpasningen af projektet.

title: "Baerer" files
description:
Hi Syam

I have compared the Old CSV-files for Danva C5 with the new ones that the system is creating. As far as I can see there is big difference ? 
I have attached one "baerer" file from the old CSV, as far as I can see the following is missing.

"Baerere"
There's a couple of mistakes in the BAERER files. 

Issue 1. The data we have in "Gruppe" should be in "Afdeling".

Issue 2. The data we have in "Afdeling" should be in "Project Themegroup" 
ALSO ... we need to clean that part, so it's only a number.

EXAMPLE:   "7070 - Administration" should be changed to "7070".
Just take what is before the " - " and we should be fine.

Issue 3. The data we have in "Project Department" should be in "Kontingentfinansieret".

Issue 4. We lack data to fill into "Project Department". We need to locate from where this is taken. 
It should hold numbers as "3" or "5" or similar.

Issue 5. We lack data to fill into "Groups" - as you can see from here:

https://www.screencast.com/t/jUgqIFgur
It should be something like "1000". Can you locate from where this is taken ? 

Issue 6. It is important not to use ” <-- that sign in any of the fields. This goes for all the CSV-files being generated.

[baerere20170821-140003.___](/uploads/b16c5fcc719afe4a750f0ceab7d1791d/baerere20170821-140003.___)

So store a Stable6.3 for example, before doing anything.

Please let me know if it is possible to do the upgrade of Danva this week ?

title: Double check
description:
Good morning  @Syam84 and @Mustafha - thank you for all your hard work Thursday / Friday. I had a very long Skype w. client Friday as you know, and we have some tasks we need done asap in order to hopefully recover the project. 
The client did not yet say if they are stopping or not, but if we have 100% working project, they will not stop!
I'm online very early, but then in transport, so if you can start by reading through the below long message and ask questions then i will answer before i travel, so you dont have too many stops.
I generally think you can divide todays tasks between you in what manner you feel is best, so the below is just my suggestion:
@Mustafha I imagine you can start working on these tasks:
11:39 PM
 1. Funds-contribution as seperate salesorder 
This I actully think you did already, but did not have time to test, so I'm just writing it to be sure:
We need to seperate the Funds-contribution into seperate SalesOrder; can you do that? Ie. so it is extra button in actions-list and seperate SO created.
 2. Make check before running funds-contribution 
Funds-contribution is only relevant if that is checked: https://screencast.com/t/5TRMFlBUGFm - ie. if it is not checked and i'm trying to run it on 1 or more records, then it should skip those records and add a note saying like "CompanynameXX does not have funds-contribution checked" (or if its too hard to get dynamic name in there, then just "Companyn does not have funds-contribution checked").
 3. Price of Salesorder not shown in widget? 
When i add new subscription-cost SO's for either company or contact via the new funtion @Mustafha made, the price of the SO is somehow not added to widget overview on that record. 
 4. Add new wateramounts
We need to add a function under actions in listview for companies, called "Add new wateramounts". This will open small modal, where you can select a year (like 2018 for next year). 
This will - for all the selected companies - add new records for water-amounts, ie these: https://screencast.com/t/ZgSxghmr
The function will then copy all the previous values for all these. Ie. copy latest 4 records per company, and just put in 0 for m2 and 0 for portions, and make the year into the year selected above.
https://screencast.com/t/yM1trLTnT3gZ
 5. Make a string with combined addreess on each company + contact 
The client would like to use address in filters for both companies listview and contacts listview. (ie. this old ticket: http://simplycrm.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=HelpDesk&view=Detail&record=18274) 
To achieve this, we need to copy the associated company-address to a string called address on each company (same for contacts) with the current format: Streetname + " " + streetnumber + " " + zip + " " + city + " "  country. 
11:40 PM
@syam84 I imagine you can start working on these tasks:
 6. Can you just spend 30 mins on trying to help out on the DIT issues that Kamilla posted? Just so we can continue with that project. Thanks  
IF this is somehting Mustafha could do instead, then that would be preferred, because there are things on Danva that you know best, and DIT is a very new project, so not much legacy-knowledge there 
After that, please continue with these Danva tasks:
 7. Remove warnings 
There are several warnings, and while it is only a warning, it is there because of some not super-well code.
"Warning: Invalid argument supplied for foreach() in /home/danva.dev/public_html/include/ListView/ListViewSession.php on line 84"
And
"Warning: implode(): Invalid arguments passed in /home/danva.dev/public_html/modules/Timesheet/models/TimeSheet.php on line 541 Warning: implode(): Invalid arguments passed in /home/danva.dev/public_html/modules/Timesheet/models/TimeSheet.php on line 541 " 
And pehaps others.
 8. Request timeregistration approval flow 
There is some error with the time-registration approval flow. I tried logging in as "je" and ask for approval of todays month. The supervisor correctly received an email w. links, but when i go to 
 9 Request budget approval flow 
Again there  is some error with the budget-registration approval flow. I tried logging in as "je" and ask for approval of a budget. The supervisor correctly received an email w. links, but when i go there the approval-button does not seem to do anything? https://screencast.com/t/FB9BkZDUH
Also we need that button to be available not only to the supervisor, but to the supervisor and anyone in a higher role. Also it shold be visible to admin. 
 10. Request budget approval responsible 
"Approved budget" workflow should send to the budgetCollection's owner (assigned-to), and not to the users boss. 
 11. Import project owner + project manager from projects 
Each project in RM2 has a Danva-user as "project owner" and the same or other user as "project manager". These should also be added to our projects. Either we should have 2 new dropdowns w. login-users and assign the ones from RM2 to each of those, or we should have one of them as the "assigend-to".
After that is done, we also need to transfer that owenership to each associated budget-collection.
 12. Copy delivery address to Magazine Saleorders 
We have a workflow that generates "Personligt medlemsskab Magazine". This works fine, BUT we need to copy the delivery-address. This will be the contacts associated delivery-address, and if that is not defined then the contacts associated company-address.
11:40 PM
 13. There is ØÆÅ problem with project-names 
Missing øæå om project-names - probably after we did CSV update last wednesday? Can you fix?
 14. Issue in accumulated budget view 
In budget view when i click acumulated, some line (perhaps those with 0 budget) dissapear - ie. item "2400" in this example: 
https://screencast.com/t/crWpUniR
 15. Dates on budgetposts 
Syam - we did a change to get those budgetposts with no budget shown in the budget. That now means that some posts that was edited in 2017 are placed under 2017 budget (look in "Vandhuset incl. kantine"-project's budget for example), while they actually belong to 2016.
For the date, we need to take the “year” field from the associated budget in table “budgets.csv”, so that in this case we are in 2016 (we can say 01-01-2016 to keep the dato format). Because otherwise we will end up with budgets wrong places
: https://screencast.com/t/ccVUm4UEHk3M
 16. More conistent month-view 
Timesheet: When i click from month to week view, the date gets messed up - ie, my current is date range is completely different. I would like to start in 1st week of that month instead. So we're counting from start of month. Ie if I am in 3rd week of may and i click to month-view i will start at 1st week of may. If i then click back to week-view i will go to 1st week of may.
 17. Timesheet jump-to-date-button 
In timesheet: Can we add a  "Jump to date"-button?

title: Funds-contribution as seperate salesorder
description:
This I actully think you did already, but did not have time to test, so I'm just writing it to be sure:
We need to seperate the Funds-contribution into seperate SalesOrder; can you do that? Ie. so it is extra button in actions-list and seperate SO created.

These are almost good 

@mustafha - when i test the "Generate subscription SO" and the "generate funds-contribution SO" buttons from action-dropdown in companies listview on DANOVA (http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Accounts&view=Detail&record=6417884) 
My guess is that the functionality is in place, but the "order" is not correct. What we want is the following:

**Generate subscription SO: ** This will generate a subscription for membership of Danva. 
* If the membership is "stemmeberettiget medlem" (allowed-to-vote-member) and there are waterportions it make the SO based on the "(Waterportion-1) * 6750 + 500" calculation.
* Else-if the membership is "firmamedlem" (just company member) it will make the SO based on the fixed price (12500 dkk) as in the product template.

**Generate funds-contribution SO: ** This will make the optional funds-contribution. 
* This will - only if the "Technology Fund Invoice" is true - generate the funds-contribution invoice of total waterportion-m3 * 0,011 dkk.

When I debug it, I think it is using the "Technology Fund Invoice" to check in order to generate Subscription-SO, not the Funds-SO. The "Technology Fund Invoice"-check should correctly be for Funds-SO. 

But, I'm not sure, as when i try to generate this Funds-SO i get a "not created" notification for reasons i dont understand: https://screencast.com/t/kQtAKaMJv

Anyway - if you can ensure it does as the above points of what we want, its super
